content.detailedDescription: my husband and i were going to a christmas party at 7 or 8 o���clock in the evening, in december of 1971 (although it could have been in 1970.) we were driving south on 86th street in des moines, iowa. at that time there used to be a large fenced-in power sub-station on the southeast corner of the intersection of 86th and university. as we approached that intersection we noticed a lot of lights in the air over the substation and stopped the car to look at it. we saw a rectangular-shaped object with rounded corners, about the size and shape of a football field and about 150 feet in the air. it wasn���t thick, and appeared to be a flat object horizontal to the ground. there heard no sound, but we had our windows rolled up. we were probably not over 300 feet away from the closest part of the object. it was hovering over the substation and had numerous bright white lights around the edges. we did not count them. we were completely taken by surprise, and it was a very scary situation, and i had the definite impression that someone was watching us. (i have wondered about missing time, but i���m pretty sure there was none, since we were on our way to a party.) i do not remember any other traffic in the area. we noticed no electrical interference, but the car was turned off. after approximately one minute it took off toward the northwest, faster than a jet, and gained altitude as it left. we never told this to anyone, even our closest friends, for a number of years.
content.summary: Football field-size & shape object hovered, then flew away

content.detailedDescription: While i was sitting on my couch at approximately 2:30 am, i heard a faint buzzing sound overhead. i stepped out onto my porch and spotted a saucer shaped object about 50 feet from me.I then ran out into the yard closer to it and snapped a photo.Slowly it started moving towards me so i ran back inside my house.I heard something land on my roof.I saw some kind of vapor falling from my ceiling.I started losing feeling in my arms and legs so i hurried outside the house onto the porch.An alien being four to four and a half feet tall charged towards me.I then held out my camera to snap a photo and it instantly stopped.As i took the photo it retreated as if it was scared of what i had. at this time, i was very frightened so i went into the house and locked the door . i looked toward the kitchen window and saw another type of alien staring in.I walked to the window and snapped a photo.The alien appeared to be upset by this and shook it's head in an unusual fashion. i then backed away and tried to stay in the center of the house. i noticed the bottom of my window blinds pulling away from the wall about ten inches. earlier, i phoned my father to hurry over for help.He was not answering so i immediately dialed 911. i had a large caliber hunting rifle(338 win mag) i was thinking about grabbing but the dispatcher told me not too.An officer came shortly afterward and they disappeared quickly.The officer looked around a little from his patrol car and left.Shortly after,my father showed up it was about 3:15 am.During this encounter my cell phone shut off twice. i managed to take about six digital photos.The next day, i went onto my roof and noticed three large scatterings of two inch staples lying on top of the shingles.Also there where depressions on the lawn where the craft landed.
content.summary: Multiple craft landing on roof and yard with two different types of beings seen at close range.Digital images captured of craft and beings.

content.detailedDescription:
On oct 30 2008
in the vivacity of the city of goose creek, berkeley county area of south carolina.
i seen 5 lights over the tree line about 10pm. the lights were in a pentagon shape blinking from red then green then white, the pentagon shape of the light were 5 times bigger then airplane landing lights, 

don blair
1. i was in my back yard
2. the size and blinking of on and off
3. thats way to big to be a plan
4. pentagon shape woving every slowly
5. wow this will be my 2nd time i have seen a ufo.
1st time was edwards airforce 1965.
6. it moved over the tree line, don't know how anybody could have      missed seeing the lights.
7. no pic.
content.summary: Slow moving, very large.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened quite some time ago.  however, my memory of this 'sighting' is still quite clear.  

i was waiting outside for my grandfather to pick me up for a program at school.  it was cold and early evening, but dark outside, which leads me to believe that it occurred sometime during late fall or winter.

i walked several feet down the parking lot, towards the basketball hoop behind the apartment building.  i look up to see a wedge shaped object, with many flashing lights, hovering, silently.  i did not know what it was.  i stood there and looked at it for just a few seconds before having this 'feeling' (for lack of a better term)... i recall a sense of knowing that this thing was going to leave.  i didn't want it to go.  i reached out and said 'wait, don't go'.  as i reached toward it with my hand, it went from motionless to gone in a zig-zag streak of light.  there was no sound.

as a point of reference, the apartment building was 3 floors tall and the object was hovering at about three times that height, back and off to the right of where the basketball hoop was located.  if i were to guess the size, i would say that it would have been close to the size of the apartment building.

aside from the obvious, there are some things that i find odd about this:

1.  i was approximately 8 years old at the time, yet i was not afraid... really, considering the circumstances, i don't recall being terribly surprised to see the thing. 
2.  i did not run in and tell my mother about it.  i just went back to where my grandfather picked me up and waited.  i did not tell my grandfather when he arrived, either.
3.  though i never 'forgot' it, i never had a desire to mention it to anyone until just the last few years.  the incident just sort of sat there, in the back of my mind.
4.  shortly after this occurred, i was picked up and taken to my granparents house to get ready for the program and i recall having a headache that was so painful, i was crying and had to cover my eyes because any kind of light made the pain worse.  my grandmother had to put a warm washcloth over my forehead and eyes while i lay on a bed with the lights off.
5.  i don't recall going to the program at school, or much of anything else that evening.
content.summary: Triangle - wedge shaped

content.detailedDescription: On sat. nov. 15th at 3p.M. my girl friend and i were going out the back door of our house on our way to the store, when she noticed a shiny maybe weather balloon looking object in the southern sky 30,000 ft. up ,hard to tell. we watched it for 6or7 mins. with binoculars and it had more of a egg look to it . we left for the store and returned 45 mins. later it was still in the sky! but had moved closer toward reno. the sun was setting and the slow moving object became more shiny and star like it moved to a moer westerly position when it seem to eject 5 star like objects ther seemed to be some gas or smoke emitted as the objects lined up one higher and 4 lowerer from the original object they all seemed to fly west till i could no longer see them.
content.summary: Watched large shiny object hover over reno.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home to modesto from my job in pleasanton calif.  in order to get to modesto, you have to go north on interstate 5 for a few miles then proceed east on  highway 120.  during that jog on interstate 5, off to my right (east) i spotted what looked like a meteor coming in.  it had all the speed of the meteors you see in the perseid or leonid meteor showers.  it was much too fast to be a plane, based on my experience in the audience of a few airshows with the thunderbirds, etc.  there was no visible fire with this meteor, although comet shaped, with a tail nearly half way across the visible sky, the "coma" and tail appeared to be composed of vapor, like that which comes from the wingtips of a fighter plane executing a really hard turn. the trajectory appeared to be horizontal. within a few seconds, the meteor's coma was directly in front of our lane of traffic.  i looked at it and inside the coma of vapor was a definite mechanical shape.  it was sort of like looking at a disk brake's rotor edge on.  there were maybe six evenly spaced rectangular vents, or windows all along the rectangular body.  the overall color was matte charcoal gray, much like you would expect from a body that went through re-entry. i'm pretty sure what i saw was just a "peek" at part of the craft which was mostly obscured by the coma of vapor.  all this time, i was alternatively stealing a glimpse of the unfolding spectacle then rechecking the traffic that flowed along like nothing unusual was happening. about the time i saw the mechanical part of the meteor it was time to move to the right so that i could make the transition onto highway 120 so i lost track of the "meteor". i never reported this for fear of redicule from the authorities. i know their policy is to discredit those who come forward with sightings like this.
content.summary: An apparent meteor was streaking in, in full daylight, when it got even with us we could see it was some sort of mechanism.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a hospice rn and at the time of my sighting i was an on-call home visit rn, coming home from making a home visit on the east side of cleveland, oh.  it was in february, 2007 at approximately 2-2:30 a.M.  

there was snow on the ground and i remember bright conditions, like moonlight reflecting off the snow making the night seem lighter than normal for that time of night.  i was driving south on i-77, just north of the pleasant valley road exit.  my car window was cracked open because i am a smoker and i was flicking ashes out the window.  i had the car radio on, but it was not turned up loud and there was no music on---my habit at that time of night was to listen to talk radio.  

there were not many cars on the highway with me and i do not remember any cars near me traveling in my direction close to me.  i was focused up ahead as i was nearing the exit.  there were fairly dense trees to my right off the road.  i sensed movement overhead and looked up through my front windshield and just slightly to my right.

i saw a huge dark triangular shape with red non-blinking lights gliding silently over the treetops, traveling north but almost as if it were following i-77 northbound (but next to the southbound lanes).  (my memory is a little fuzzy about the color of the lights---at times i see red lights in my memory, and at times i see white lights).  it was not directly overhead, but no more than maybe 20-30 feet to my right.  i could clearly see the outline of the craft and remember thinking it was not an airplane.  i also made note of the fact that the lights were solid and not blinking.  i put my window all the way down and could not hear anything---it was completely silent.  i estimate the craft to be about 100 yards across at the widest part.  it was clearly outlined against the moonlit sky.  it did not look metallic from my angle; i had the sense that it was black.

i turned my attention to the road ahead and drove as quickly as i could to the curving exit ramp.  as i came around the curve of the ramp, i was going to end up facing north.  i looked in the direction i had seen the craft and (as large as it was) i expected to see the back end of it.  i could not locate the craft again and assumed the tree tops were in my way.  

i looked in the paper and online after my sighting, hoping to see reports of other sightings, but i found nothing.  for a long time i just felt satisfied that i knew what i saw and it was nothing i had ever seen.  after almost 2 years, i���ve decided i want to report my sighting to someone just so my sighting is documented somewhere.  i���m not saying it was extraterrestrial, but it definitely was a ufo because i could not identify it, it was definitely flying, and it was an object.  could it have been a stealth bomber?  my instincts tell me that a stealth bomber is not 100 yards wide, but i have no idea.
content.summary: I saw a huge dark triangular shape with red non-blinking lights gliding silently over the treetops.

content.detailedDescription: I left livermore at 1:30am and was driving on corral hollow road when i noticed the mountain tops were lit up with orange light. when i got to the end of corral hollow road, i turned onto 580 south towards 132. when i was driving down the ramp to get onto 580 i noticed in the distance an orange square object. the time was approx. 1:50 am. when i was 3/4 a mile from the 132 exit i was up on a small hill looking down at what appeared to be a large tear drop object. i wasn't making any sense of this. the top was blacker then the blackest night sky. if i had to guess it was aroung 600 feet across. i turned onto the 132 exit seeing the object directly in front of me hovering around 40 feet above the ranch houses to the right of the guard rail. i was scared but did not know what to do so i kept driving. the object was located just above the ramp where the road turns to go over 580 towards modesto. as i got close to the object red lights came on. the pattern of the red lights was 1-6, 2-5,1-4 etc. i remember looking in my rear view mirror but the rest of the drive to modesto is a blank. the next clear thing i remember is being in my apartment and asking myself what i just saw. i have kept this to myself and only decided to write this letter after seeing ufo files and ufo hunters on the history channel. this experiance has changed my life forever and there hasn't been a day that i haven't thought about it.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Square glowing orange at approx. 4 miles away

content.detailedDescription: While driving east bound on i-80 in eastern salt lake city i saw what i at first believed was a star. after observing it hanging in place for a few seconds the golden light began moving at an increasing rate. it picked up speed rapidly and disappeared leaving a streak of light. it was similar to a shooting star except that it was a golden color and wasn't moving for the initial few seconds of observation and the light pollution in the area would have prevented the viewing of shooting stars.
content.summary: Glowing golden star-like orb hanging in sky and then bolted off

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in our back yard in modesto, california enjoying a glass of wine (yes, just one) and admiring the stars that were very brilliant that night.  suddenly, a black shape zipped by, right in my line of vision.  i quickly turned my head and caught up with the shape.  it might be described as a chevron shape with all corners rounded.  it was slightly reflective because i could see the orange light from our city's sodium street lights flickering on the bottom of the craft.  there were no running lights of any kind on the craft and it was absolutely silent.  i could see that in a fraction of a second the object would be obscured by my neighbor's two story house so i ran quickly to our front yard just in time to see the craft execute an abrupt right-angle turn.  this took him from a northerly direction to a westerly. about five seconds later he made another right-angle turn that took him back to a northerly course again. being close enough to the ground to see the reflections of street lights, i estimate that the "wingspan" of the craft was no greater than 30 feet.  i'm puzzled about why the right-angle turns made to noise as i've witnessed airplanes executing aerobatic maneuvers and the wings make a lot of racket when pulling tight turns sort of like a golf club makes during a hard swing.
content.summary: Chevron-shaped object with no lights flew over at night, made two right-angle turns.

content.detailedDescription:
On 11-14-08 at approx. 5:30 a.M. i woke up in my bed unable to move or scream. my girlfriend was sleeping right next to me, and my 93 pound great pyrenese puppy was asleep at the foot of my bed. i moved my eyes around to my avail on my left side i saw what looked like a rouned expandable antenna held by a white hand moving towards the side of my head. my dog was woken up and immediately jumped up off the bed and started growling and went into alert mode. ( im a former police officer and k-9 handler i work in corrections now and my dog is a working dog.) then my dog got low to the ground and was out of my sight. the hand holding the antenna was now pointed at her and she stoped barking and growling. i then was able to move a litle and was filled with unbridled rage. i moved my eyes to the left and saw my alarm it said 5:35 a.M. my left hand that had felt like it was being held down as i stated before being paralyzed now swung to my left with all the force in my body and made contact with a hard but latex feeling body. immediately i jumped and looked to my left where this being was at previously and it was gone. and my alarm now stated it was 5:38 a.M. my girlfriend now woke up i told her to run into the living room and the dog followed her, i grabbed my 9mm glock went into my living room cleared that room and cleared my apartment. i do not know what this was and why it had happened but i prayed to jesus christ to help me and he did. i have had many strange experiances but not on this magnitude and have always felt like i am being watched. i work 11pm to 7pm so i dont have to sleep at night. i work in corrections now so someone is always around be it another staff member or an inmate or my dog. i can never have enough weapons either i am always buying a new gun every few months, and just always feeling like some one is going to try and take me or invade my home. if someone could help me out with this please do so, or maybe just a few helpfull words of encourgement from people that this is happening to as well. thank you. 

respectfully submitted 

          jon
content.summary: Alien abduction thwarted.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and adult son and i went down to the cliffs in ocean beach, san diego, county for the purpose of watching the sunset and maybe seeing the "green flash" that's common at lower latitudes.  when the sun was very near the horizon and dim enough so that we could stare straight into it, i noticed that the sun seemed to have two oval shaped, black "eyes" much like the eyes on the prototypical "happy face," "have a nice day" logo. the two vertical ovals were spaced about the right distance apart and their tops were lined up perfectly so that neither was higher on the "face" than the other.  someone said, "oh they must be marine helicopters coming straignt at us.  but i didn't think any helicopter would have a perfectly oval profile.  also, if they were helicopters coming straight at us then the sun would appear to move behind them and pretty soon they would no longer be in a direct line with the sun.  i said "maybe they are sunspots," not really thinking that sunspots are never symmetrical and never identical to any other sunspot, and never that large in relationship to the entire sun. as it was, the ovals moved with the sun until it had sunk below the horizon.  this would indicate that the earth was turning away from both the sun and the ovals.  i didn't even think about that at the time.  i just knew the ovals were not helicopters or planes.  only within the past month (more than 8 years later) did it dawn on me that only a ufo could be that far out from earth and still have that large an apparent size.
content.summary: Two symmetrical and identical "eyes" seen in setting sun which followed it down to horizon.

content.detailedDescription: My boss and i were returning to sacramento, ca on southwest airlines from business meetings in phoenix, az. we had just left phoenix on the phoenix to san diego leg of the trip. we were in the back of the plane where seats face each other.  as i recall, we were far enough out of phoenix to be at or near cruise altitude.  i was looking down at the scrolling dessert floor and i spotted what i first thought was some huge boomerang shaped cement building.  from our altitude it just seemed surprising that a building would be so huge. also, there were no roads, dirt or paved leading up to the "building." i had flown over meteor crater in arizona from approximately 30,000 feet. meteor crater is almost a mile in diameter and it appeared to be about the size of a nickle held at arm's length.  this boomerang thing looked about twice that length.  then i notice that the desert floor was moving under it.  that's when i knew that it was hovering and not planted on the ground.  i then pointed it out to my boss, who was seated opposite me.  we both watched the object until it was no longer in sight.  this object was smooth, the wing tips were squared off, not rounded.  the wing was clean, with no engine nacelles or control surfaces.  both of us thought it was pretty puzzling but we had no emotions about it, per se.
content.summary: Huge triangle seen hovering above desert floor from airliner at cruise altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
On 11-14-2008 at approximatly 9:00pm (pt) in the foothills of sylmar,ca.I was sitting on the porch of my home when suddenly i heard a low humming noise from above me,i stepped off the porch to look up in the sky , when i noticed 7 to 8 bright red lights on what looked like a very large diamond or triangular shaped craft ,it moved very slow ,my house sits on the north east end of the san fernando valley in so. calif. the red lights were stationary and suddenly they began to move rapidly around the edge of the craft in a strobe like fashion , the object moved silently and stealth like in a s/e direction , i rushed in my house to call my wife yolanda and kids and also a friend ,who all came out to see it , i wanted to make sure i had other witnesses, because this was something unlike any thing i have ever seen in my life. my son david asked me dad what is that, and i had no answear.
 all this took place within a 7 min. time frame ,once my family and i resumed to observe the object for 20 mins. heading east towards the pacific coast , it moved very slowly ,all of a sudden this large object appeared to seperate into 7 smaller crafts,each had one white light with a red light encircling it very rapidly ,we observed these smaller objects fly off in different directions with one flying back towards our house ,when it was close enough i noticed that it had 4 white  lights on its underside and a single red light going rapidly around it, now here's where it gets more intresting ,this object along with another one headed west over some hills towards veterans park ,where less than an hour later around 10:30pm, a major fire began in the area where i lost sight of these objects the fire has caused evacuations and loss of homes,all the rescue helicopters in the air resembled "nothing",i repeat "nothing" looked like what my family and i witnessed,did this ufo have something to do with the sayre fire ? i'm feeling excited,and confused,i hope you guys find some answears to these sightings that took place an hour before this horrible fire started. my life will forever be changed by this.
sincerely and truthfully david aguilar.
sylmar,ca.  11-15-2008
content.summary: On 11-14-08 i heard low humming sound which caused me to look up , that's when i seen 7 to 8 red lights on the sides  of  what looked like a diamond  or triangle shaped craft.

content.detailedDescription:
Roughly 4:30pm while visiting with a neighbor in his driveway we observed a cloud-like object move from behind his neighbors house. object aprox 15 feet off the ground moving in a straight line south to north.
aprox speed 15 mph which did not vary faster nor slower for short time it was viewed. no sound from object. other normal noises from neighborhood not dampened. object aprox 25feet long by 12feet high by 10feet wide. could be said to be somewaht teardrop shaped or conical. 
as object broke cover i asked my neighbor, "wtf is that?" turning slightly for answer. he was tracking abject the same as i was. later questioning him for description...Matches mine. total viewing time aprox 4 seconds as object moved across the yard into cul-de-sac where it left line of sight raising over opposing nieghbors house. aprox distance covered; 60yards.
-orignial vector obstruction free or object not required to manuever around ornamental trees. did not pass through any obstructions.
- no winds. no breezes at the time of sighting. no tree branches moving.

misc. observations:
-no roiling nor changes in surface or shape for duration of sighting.
-no vapour trail.
-examination of nieghbor's grass/yard shows no visible disturbance.
-trees semi-visible through object.
-multiple surfaces on object which did not reform nor otherwise change orientation. 
-object had a vague opalescent quality as though a stronger light source was available in spite of object being sited in shade and below tree-line.
right front of object initially had pale pinkish opalescence coloring wich faded quickly. left top of object briefly opalesced pale blue.
- no animals in the area disturbed such as neighborhood dogs being set off.

possible related data:
-3 blackhawk helicopter teams reported in immediate area and not at the l'ville ap. 
-local pilots diverted to athen ap due to other military traffic at the lawrenceville airport. 
-object very low to the ground as though intentially trying to stay out of sight from main hwy or lawrenville swannee directly behind my house. lifted out of vector or new vector at point of densest tree cover from that line of sight. 
-initial point of sighting secluded and otherwise not visible from hwy nor cul-de-sac.
-object would have been entirely visually camoflauged or otherwise unremarkable if sighted higher in the air/sky.
content.summary: Cloud like shape moved across nieghbor's yard  into cul de sac. exited nw direction.

content.detailedDescription:
November 15th 2008

my ufo experience as a child in the early 1960���s

this ufo experience occurred in hopewell new jersey in the early 1960���s. i was a young child 4-6 years old so it was between 1961-1964.

my father and i were driving back from the flemington fair in flemington nj, it was late in the evening and we were cutting through the hopewell nj area to get home to ewing township which is near trenton the state capital. 

the hopewell area had lots of farms and tree filled areas. the ufo was hovering over a barn about 100 feet over the barn just about 500 linier feet off of the road. it was large about 500 square feet in size. the ufo was cube shaped with a few portholes that looked like windows in the middle around the object. the object had different colored lights around it. some were steady and some were pulsing dimmer and then brighter. 

please note: i am now 51 years old and in sound mind. but as i am writing this letter with tears streaming from my eyes, i have huge chills flying up my spine. i also feel scared and very uneasy. this happens every time i think about this. i will continue.

as my father and i drove passed this object i lost my ability to move and talk. i was sitting in the back seat at the time and i was almost totally paralyzed. my father just kept on driving. he did not talk to me at all until we arrived back at our home about 30 minutes later. i had no idea what a ufo was at the time of this sighting and i could not move or talk until my father and i arrived at home. 

after we arrived home i could then move and talk again. i was hysterical and i cried and cried. i told both of my parents about not being able to move and talk which was mainly why i was freaking out. i also told them about the large object hovering over the barn and i explained that was when the paralyses started. my father never saw a thing and he thought that i was crazy to be acting this way. i can remember my mother yelling at my father telling him that i would not be hysterical for no reason at all and drilling him about what really happened. he just said that he never saw a thing.

this is my ufo experience! i often wonder if there was more to this then i can remember because it still affects me so strongly to this day. i am weirdly still afraid that this could re-occur. please share this with others.
content.summary: My sighting documentation

content.detailedDescription: I had just turned on the late evening news, weatherman said possible snow showers later.  i went out to the backyard deck to bring my tools into the garage.  i stood on the deck and heard a commercial aircraft approaching from the northeast (i live along one of the flight corridors for dia) and watched it pass over the house at about 10,000 ft.  just as the plane passed off to the southwest, i saw a bluish/white double light pass over my head at about 8,000 ft. just below and to the right of the airliner.  it then just vanished, lights out, hyperspeed.  it made no sound. i could not tell what the shape was because it was gone too quickly, but the shape of the lights could be described as bullet-shaped and smaller in size than the airliner.  this account is very similar to the one that occurred earlier in the evening in arizona (posted by the pilot).  because of that post, i decided to add mine, they are both very similar.  what struck me afterwards was whether the pilots or passengers in that airliner had witnessed the same thing. about an hour later, the weirdest ground-level fog came in from the northeast, very quickly.  i am sure it wasn't related, but it still freaked me out.
content.summary: Bright bluish/white double light passed overhead at same time as commercial jet.

content.detailedDescription:
Some idiot with nothing better to do with their lives had taken to stabbing through the sidewalls of the tyres on my daughters car.
we set up a security camera in the hope of catching the guilty party, the camera is screwed to the window frame of my daughters living room and is kept focused on the car.
images are recorded through the night while the household sleeps, running through the recording of the 13/11/2008 we came across a flash of light moving from left to right at great speed (blink and you'll miss it sort of speed)but it looks to be about only 1mtr away from the camera, on freezing the image you can see that it has a darker centre but you still can't make much out of it.
i'm sure someone with the right equipment could make more sense of this thing than i ever could.
this "thing" whatever it is does not look very big on the tape, maybe 1ft to 18ins long and about 9ins wide, given that the camera is fixed at about 4mtrs high and the car and pavement (sidewalk) are about 10mtrs away i'm sure that someone with the proper expertise could work out the exact dimensions of this thing (whatever it is) using the distances with the exact size of the car, perhaps the image could be enhanced to the point where we can see for certain what this is, if i was capable of doing it myself i would---but i can't---anyway i would'nt know where to begin when it comes putting things onto the net i'm just starting out on the www, but if you are interested and have the capability to do these things let me know and i'll send out a few tapes, i would love to have stumbled on to something without looking for it.
obviously i do not have an infinate number of tapes to give away--so please if you are a mentalcase dont ask.
content.summary: Flash of light moving at speed directly in front of a security camera.

content.detailedDescription:
I came back from taking my dad home and went out on the back deck to look at the stars. i had my green 5mw laser with me. there was a very light high cloud cover and i was flashing the laser into them. the clouds were still thin enough to see the brightest stars. i observed a light that seemed to pulse slowly on then off. i watched for a few seconds and then flashed the laser in the direction of the light. it again pulsed on and off. i waited and nothing happened. once again, i flashed the laser and the light again pulsed. this happened several times and then it streaked toward the north and disappeared. it was a very white light. the light as i observed it, was at about the 11 oclock position in the east north east direction. this was not a plane first of all, because it didn't move. i understand that at a high altitude, a slow moving plane could be interpreted as to be not moving from the perspective of the ground, however this did not move. secondly, this light was not aircraft lights. aircraft lights pulse off and on at about 1-2 second intervals. i don't know the exact flash rate for aircraft lights, but i have observed too many aircraft in my life. this light did not flash that way. it was not a meteor. also, the light from my angle of sight, would not have been bright enough or as visible if it were aircraft lights.
one thing that i find strange, and i am going to attribute it to not paying attention to the time, i took my dad home and left my house just before 7pm. it takes about 20 minutes from my house to his and 20 minutes back. if i say that i left my house at 7 that would put me back at my house at about 7:40pm. i will round that up to 8pm to account for any stray time. when i got home i stopped in the house for about 3-4 minutes before i went out on the back deck. i wasn���t wearing a jacket, just my work shirt, and it was a little chilly. that puts the time at about 8:05pm. i remember for about 5 minutes just playing with the laser shining it in random directions watching the beam. that puts it at about 8:10pm. i also remember that as i observed the light pulsing, i came out of a slight daze. i watched for a few more minutes after it streaked away and came back in the house. i looked at my daughter stephanie, on the computer in the kitchen, to which she said, ���wow, have you been outside this whole time?��� i then looked at the clock and it was 9:15pm. if i round the time that i was playing randomly with the laser down to 8:30 and take the away 5 minutes for the few minutes after it went away, that still leaves 40 minutes that i don���t remember being out there at all. i don���t know what to make of this. i am aware of the missing time phenomenom, but i am trying to guess at alternatives. do i think that i was taken aboard this object? no, but i can't explain the time.
content.summary: Pulsing light

content.detailedDescription: Looking out on my patio at roughly 11:50 pm to see what i thought at first was a star or plane but after going inside for 5 minutes i came back out to see object still in the exact same position with the same colored lights flashing. just now what looks like a small meteor passed on the left hand side of the flashing lights. the object seems to get slightly brighter then dim every few minutes. the object is completly still and has not moved in almost 15 minutes. i will write more later.
content.summary: Red blue white lights flickering. object appairs to be completely stationary in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were getting ready to put the kids to bed.  she was in my sons room helping him put his pajamas on and closing the shudders when she saw the craft floating by.  it was fairly close to our house, maybe 500-1000 feet away and less than 500 feet off the ground.  when she first saw it, it was glowing red and had a thick antenna like structure on top.  she ran excitedly to me in the kitchen and said there was something very weird outside.  she momentarily protested when i went to run outside but then followed.

i saw the craft after it had already passed our house but it was still large enough and close enough for me to see details, including panels on the side which glowed brightly and made the whole craft glow.  for a few moments i stood in awe and shock as is casually floated through the neighborhood, changing colors and pulsing.  i then ran back inside and got my digital camara which also take movies.

by the time i got back out it had moved farther away, but it was still close enough for anyone seeing it with me to know that it was something out of the ordinary.  i caputured about 2 minutes of footage, which does not show too much detail but you can clearly see it changing colors and pulsing.

eventually it moved below my field of view and i returned inside.  neither my wife or i slept very much that night.  it was exhilirating, fascinating and a bit frightening.  over the next few days we both experienced a bit of mental blocking, like our minds were trying to deny what we saw.  we we try to think of the craft it seems like a fantasy, or we have trouble recalling the image.  there is absolutely no doubt about what we saw.  we cannot say if it alien, or some kind of government technology.  all we know is that we saw a very unique, and apparently advanced craft.

my 4 1/2 year old son saw it too and called it the "bad army airplane."  he drew a picture of it the next day.  however, if you ask him about it now he denies that he saw anything.

if the video does not come through please email me.  i am happy to provide it again.
content.summary: Two pie tins with thick antenna like structure on top.  it had panels on the sides that glowed brightly.

content.detailedDescription: st klamath falls or went outside to smoke with girlfriend,she said whats that. looked up seen triangle shaped red blue and white lights flashing all together mixed flashing no pattern to color flashes.Seems to be hovering in sky. might have moved alittle bit. but not much outside for 5 minutes still there when went back inside.It is south east of klamath falls it is 11:35 pm  looked out window it is still there. event started at 11:15 pacific time
content.summary: Blue red white lights hovering south east of klamath falls or.

content.detailedDescription: Got ready to go to bed went outside for a look at the stars major thunderstorm just passed(always do since last time also in november much more exciting) noticed a bright starlike light west above the horizon it did not move bright then disappeared then 2 sec appeared, went red orange then disappeared then 2 sec appeared, went red orange and white on off for about 15min got tired and went to bed
content.summary: Light floating above horizon flashing colour redi-orange white disapearing and reapearing.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Was in my parking lot of apartment complex and saw a orange object coming from the southwest part of san antonio heading to location where i lived and then swiched locations and begin to hover over san antonio. it made no noise and remained the same color(orange).I estimate it was 2 to 3 miles in the air when i saw it.I saw it for a total of about 5 minutes.I noticed closely to it a plane(air force maybe)streak by it and i lost sight of object.It was not a weather ballon,aircraft,or helicopter.It had no flight pattern and was of unknown orgin.I was by myself and had no camera with me or any other witnesses.I called 911,ksat 12 news,kens news and no other reports of sighting.I do not know what it was.I noticed it flying  from ingram mall area as i was at frederickburg road and callaghan area when i noticed object.That is when it started to hover over san antonio.Strange to say the least.I first thought object was a plane when it came into view but what got my attention was the area it was coming as i have never seen object come from sw direction.I was in parking lot feeding deer at time of object being first noticed.I looked down briefly and when i looked up it was out of my sight.I knew when i saw it that it was something i could not identify.I wanted someone else to see it too,as i have never seen a orange object hover in the air like that.Hope to see it again.Was at about 4:30 pm.The lights of what i believe was a plane was very close to object as it hovered was interesting.The plane appeared out of nowhere and streaked by object,shortly after this i lost sight of object.First time i have ever seen anything like this.
content.summary: Orange object  came my direction at about 200 mph,switched locations and hovered over san antonio.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my couch next to my back door and my cousin dominic was in my backyard talking on the phone.  he ran into the house and told me to come outside, he thought a big animal was in my trees.  i go outside and he described to me what he heard.  as i was looking into my trees, very high in the sky, we saw a moving light floating across the sky.  we paid close attention to it as we knew it wasn't a plane or a helicopter.  the ufo disappeared within about a minute, just gone.  that made us start looking into the sky more.  about 2 minutes later, my cousin dominic pointed south and said 'ufo.'  i looked where he was pointing and in the sky, about a quarter of a mile away, was a huge black isocolese triangular ufo with 8 (i believe, maybe 7 or 9) red lights on the front, left, and right sides, coming at us with the v of the triangle in front, very, very slowly.  at first, it looked like 7 helicopters, with solid red lights, flying in formation next to each other, but that went away as quick as it came.  it was less than 100 feet in the air, and when it got over my backyard, the red lights started blinking very rapidly, like the way the red lights on a modem would blink.  rapid and untamed.  it took about a minute and a half for it to get from one end of my yard to the other, which is about 50 feet, so if you did the math on that you would figure out how fast it was going.  it was from the look of it about a few hundred feet across, and about a few hundred feet in length, and maybe 50 feet in height.  it was solid, perfectly shaped, very black, no sound, very close, we could see the technology which theres not much to say other than it was perfectly smooth and black, and the way it flew was unlike anything i have ever seen.  it glided straight, thats the best way to describe the way it flew.  it didn't fly unnaturally, that's probably the hardest thing to describe.  to get a visual, picture taking a backwards checkmark, giving it depth, painting it black, taking it off the page and pointing the 'check' at you, and putting red lights across the front of it, and making it the size i speak of, and you would be able to visualize what i, my cousin, the people across the street, and other randoms in my neighborhood saw tonight.  my cousin was calm about seeing this.  i was scared.  very scared.  i have never seen anything that big in my life save for a skyscrapper.  when you see something that big flying that close to you, knowing what it is, its petrifying.  i did not get a good feeling about it.  i would say its one of the, if not the most frightening thing i've ever seen in my life and to be completely honest i'm scared to go in my backyard alone.  when it got over my backyard was when the lights started blinking, which i got the feeling that they wanted us to know they saw us maybe or something, i didn't think that was coincidence but logic would assume it was.  i don't know what to say about that part of it, but that's the part that made me scared, that mixed with the slow pace and the closeness to me and my house.  i could've hit that thing with a slingshot, thats how close it was.  very, very scary.  we tried to film it but we didn't have time.  we wanted to see it.  we didn't get our cameras till it had past our house, and we caught the back of it on film with the lights in the front blinking, but it didn't come out too good at all.  in the hopes of filming it, we got in my cousins car and chased after it.  but with traffic at that time in la mixed with the other things in the sky we saw that night (which i believe there to have been more ufo's but i cannot confirm that because they were only distant lights in the sky), we lost it.  we ended up going to the park on woodley ave by my house to look at the other things we saw in the sky.  another thing i want to point out is that by the time we got to woodley park there were dozens of helicopters and planes in the sky.  dozens.  they were everywhere.  it was like an invasion of our own air force.  but, either way, we did lose sight of it and ended up going home.  we played back the footage we took but nothing came out.  i wish it did.  but other than testimony of me and at least 4 other people i know, there isn't any evidence of this other than my 911 call.  personally, it was a life altering event, truly.  i don't know if you got other reports about this thing tonight, but hopefully mufon can do what they do and find some evidence.  good luck.
content.summary: Black isoceles triangle

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 7:05pm i was standing outside looking up at the full (or nearly full) moon, when i witnessed an object high in the night sky. it had no lights, the only reason i saw it was because of the brightness of the moon and it's close proximity to it. it "tumbled" slowly horizontily beneath the moon, rather how i would expect things to tumble in zero gravity, end over end, but this was definitly in the atmosphere. and it's "tumbling" was seen as the moonlight reflected off of it's metallic surface. it's shape was odd, not exactly oval, not exactly egg shaped, very hard to describe but something close to that. after only seconds, 30-40, it disappeared into heavy cloud cover and was gone. this is the first time i've ever seen anything like this, i thought that if i were to see a ufo there would be lights or something... but i guess not. 

a brief note here: while watching it my eyes lost focus on it for just a moment and it seemed to disappear in that time, then my focus came back and it was there again. this might sound weird but when that happened i felt like it was looking back at me.
content.summary: Brief sighting of metallic object high in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside smoking a cig... when i saw a bright orange light which got bigger... hovered and  then several lights came from it and the orage light zigzaged and then was gone.
i was not afraid... which was weird... but was more in shock or disbelief for what i had just seen!
content.summary: Bright orange light which got bigger... hovered and  then several lights came from it and the orage light zigzaged and then was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work (north on 164-headed for interstate 64). it was around 11 o'clock at night. i look to the west and notice a very bright light in the distance, thinking it must be a plane getting ready to land at evansville regional airport. still driving, i kept looking in that direction and the light was getting closer and closer. i then noticed that it was actually two lights. as the lights kept getting closer, i noticed it was a perfect triangle of three very bright white lights. i was trying to see if there was any blinking lights on the craft and there wasn't any, and then it kinda dawned on me that this craft was moving way too slow to be a normal airplane and it was headed right toward me. i stopped my car about 6 miles south of interstate 64 to see if it was even moving at all. this flying triangle appeared to be about 1000 feet off the ground give or take, and it didn't seem to be moving any faster than a car driving down a highway. as this craft flew over head and turned south toward evansville, i could see that the back of the craft was concave with three bright white lights as well and three smaller, dimmer red lights on the lower end of it......None of the lights were blinking. i kept watching the craft, amazed at how large it was flying at low altitude, and also how slow it was moving....Watching it until it went behind the horizon. i obviously don't think this was an alien space craft...Because i am a bigtime skeptic of all things paranormal.....Especially ufo's....All ufo means is something in the air that a person doesn't recognize....Nothing more, nothing less. however, i am fascinated by aviation and i would like to know if anyone else has seen these craft in this general area.
content.summary: Flying triangle over i-64 by evansville

content.detailedDescription: My girl friend and i were out back at 6 p.M. i was showing her the area in the sky that i had seen a large amber light expand like a nova then go back down to a starlike object and then fly to the south; when a few seconds later i see a large amber landing light looking object my girl friend looks up to see it i tell her to track it will i get the binoculars, she makes a comment about how easy it is to see. it continues across the sky from the the s.East ,i'm now watching it with the binocuars its a triangle with a white light on the front a red lighton rear port side and a green light on the rear starboard side 2 white lights in the center. completely silent. we watched as it passed over, it then flipped on its side which made the lights of the craft line up single file as it drove towards the n.East horizon our house blocked our view as i ran around the side of the house but lost site of it . hard to tell but craft seemed to be around 20,000 ft.
content.summary: Black triangle with white green red lights on tips 2 white lights in center.
